summary: The module defines a test suite for a speech recognition RNNT encoder‑decoder model that uses byte‑pair encoding tokenization. It includes a helper model class that assembles hierarchical RNNT components and a collection of tests that verify model construction, forward computation, decoding (greedy and beam), vocabulary updates, and persistence of model artifacts, while also handling optional Numba acceleration.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the RNNT‑based ASR pipeline with BPE tokenization, supporting continuous integration and regression testing for speech recognition products.
